title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and subject matter experts from the oil refinery industry.

title: System Architecture Design for SmartRefinerySafety Project
description: Design the overall system architecture considering IoT infrastructure (MQTT for device communication), data pipelines (Kafka or similar), AI models (TensorFlow or PyTorch), and integration with existing systems. The design should take into account scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance requirements using microservices architecture. Additionally, incorporate best practices in software engineering for maintainability, extensibility, and containerization using Docker. To ensure a robust and secure system, include measures such as data encryption, access controls, and intrusion detection systems. The design should also prioritize real-time data processing capabilities. Lastly, consider the need for monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus or Grafana for troubleshooting and performance analysis.

title: IoT Infrastructure Setup
description: Set up the IoT infrastructure, including sensors, gateways, and communication protocols, for collecting data from equipment and environmental conditions.

title: Data Pipeline Development
description: Develop data pipelines for ingesting, processing, and storing data from IoT devices and other sources.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop AI models for equipment monitoring, environmental condition analysis, and worker activity monitoring.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and managing the system, including dashboards, alerts, and reporting.

title: Integration with Existing Systems
description: Integrate the SmartRefinerySafety system with existing systems and databases in the oil refinery.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure system and data integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure system reliability and performance.

title: Deployment and Maintenance
description: Deploy the SmartRefinerySafety system in the production environment, establish monitoring and logging mechanisms, and plan for ongoing maintenance and updates.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials, to support system adoption and maintenance.
